mapper.sql: a.Awards_Id, a.AwardsContent, a.AwardsDate, a.AddName, a.ADDTIME, a.UpdateName, a.UpdateTime, a.DeleteName, a.DeleteTime, a.TimeLiness, a.Student_Id, a.Classes_Id
mapper.select: select ,s.Student_Id,s.Student_Name,c.Classes_Id, c.Classes_Name from awards a inner join student s on a.Student_Id=s.Student_Id inner join classes c on a.Classes_Id=c.Classes_Id where a.TimeLiness = 0
select Awards_Id, AwardsContent, AwardsDate, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Student_Id, Classes_Id from tr01904.awards where Awards_Id = #{awardsId}
select Awards_Id, AwardsContent, AwardsDate, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Student_Id, Classes_Id from tr01904.awards limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into tr01904.awards(AwardsContent, AwardsDate, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Student_Id, Classes_Id) values (#{awardscontent}, #{awardsdate}, #{addname}, #{addtime}, #{updatename}, #{updatetime}, #{deletename}, #{deletetime}, #{timeliness}, #{studentId}, #{classesId})

insert into tr01904.awards(AwardsContent, AwardsDate, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Student_Id, Classes_Id) values
(#{entity.awardscontent}, #{entity.awardsdate}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.studentId}, #{entity.classesId})

insert into tr01904.awards(AwardsContent, AwardsDate, AddName, ADDTIME, UpdateName, UpdateTime, DeleteName, DeleteTime, TimeLiness, Student_Id, Classes_Id) values
(#{entity.awardscontent}, #{entity.awardsdate}, #{entity.addname}, #{entity.addtime}, #{entity.updatename}, #{entity.updatetime}, #{entity.deletename}, #{entity.deletetime}, #{entity.timeliness}, #{entity.studentId}, #{entity.classesId})
on duplicate key update AwardsContent = values(AwardsContent) , AwardsDate = values(AwardsDate) , AddName = values(AddName) , ADDTIME = values(ADDTIME) , UpdateName = values(UpdateName) , UpdateTime = values(UpdateTime) , DeleteName = values(DeleteName) , DeleteTime = values(DeleteTime) , TimeLiness = values(TimeLiness) , Student_Id = values(Student_Id) , Classes_Id = values(Classes_Id)
mapper.update:
update tr01904.awards
AwardsContent = #{awardscontent},
AwardsDate = #{awardsdate},
AddName = #{addname},
ADDTIME = #{addtime},
UpdateName = #{updatename},
UpdateTime = #{updatetime},
DeleteName = #{deletename},
DeleteTime = #{deletetime},
TimeLiness = #{timeliness},
Student_Id = #{studentId},
Classes_Id = #{classesId},
where Awards_Id = #{awardsId}
